Name: Sacrifice
Effect: Destroy unit; gain 25% of Mana cost

Name: SKIP
Limitations: Increase duration of all existing modifiers by 3 turns

Name: Cone of Ice
Effect: Unit takes 30 - 45 damage and gains Sluggish 1 for 3 turns

Name: Cone of Electricity
Effect: Unit takes 30 - 45 damage and gains Weakened 5 for 3 turns

Name: Refresh
Effect: Unit regains movement and attack for turn.

Name: Spacial Shift
Effect: Switch locations of commander and the chosen unit.
Limitations: Resulting locations must be legal for both units

Name: Cone of Light
Effect: Unit takes 45-90 damage and gains Blinded 2 for 3 turns

Name: Mana Shield
Effect: Unit gains Shielded 25 for 3 turns then heal unit 50% max health
